name: Aiflooring TerraSeal
description: Aiflooring TerraSeal is designed to be used as a stand-alone thin film system, a silica broadcast system, and the topcoat for the TerraRichïƒ¢ system. It provides continuous chemical protection while providing a high-gloss, nonblushing finish for an outstanding appearance. It can be applied from 16-65 mils in smooth or anti-skid applications with moderate physical requirements and intermittent chemical exposure. TerraGrip can be added to TerraSeal to provide slip resistance. It is a two component 100% solids epoxy coatings cured with a cycloaliphatic amine.
